sneckomod:SneckoSoul.NAME: Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #ysneckomod:Unknown card into your deck, increase your Max HP by #b1.

sneckomod:SuperSneckoSoul.NAME: Super Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Upon pickup, increase your Max HP by #b1 for each #ysneckomod:Unknown card in your deck.

sneckomod:ConfusingCodex.NAME: Ring of the Snek
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b0-2 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

sneckomod:CrystallizedMud.NAME: Mesmerising Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. #ysneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost #b0.

sneckomod:LoadedDie.NAME: Loaded Die
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards that choose random numbers have +1 minimum.

sneckomod:RareBoosterPack.NAME: Rare Booster Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain a #ysneckomod:Unknown #yRare card of each card type.

sneckomod:SleevedAce.NAME: Sleeved Ace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yCheat into your hand with #yRetain.

sneckomod:UnknownEgg.NAME: Unknown Egg
sneckomod:UnknownEgg.FLAVOR: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.
